author: Grant Murray
description: Plum sake, chilli spice and maraschino cherry delicately flavour cognac in this stirred, boozy after-dinner cocktail.
name: The Devil In Me
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Umeshu plum sake/ Japanese plum wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass

video.description: Plum sake, chilli spice and maraschino cherry delicately flavour cognac in this stirred, boozy after-dinner cocktail.
video.name: HOWTO make The Devil In Me
